name: xbsj-renderer

scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-web
scripts.build-unminified: npm run build-node-unminified && npm run build-web-unminified
scripts.build-web: rimraf dist-web && npm run build-web-minified && npm run build-web-obfuscated && ncp dist-web-obfuscated dist-web && rimraf dist-web/xr-base-utils.js && ncp dist-web-minified/xr-base-utils.js dist-web/xr-base-utils.js
scripts.build-node: rimraf dist-node && npm run build-node-minified && npm run build-node-obfuscated && ncp dist-node-obfuscated dist-node && rimraf dist-node/xr-base-utils && ncp dist-node-minified/xr-base-utils dist-node/xr-base-utils
scripts.build-node-obfuscated: webpack --config ./tools/webpack-node/webpack.prod.obfuscated.js && ncp dist-node-declartions dist-node-obfuscated && rimraf dist-node-declartions && ts-node tools/webpack-node/distReplace.ts -i ./dist-node-obfuscated
scripts.build-node-minified: webpack --config ./tools/webpack-node/webpack.prod.minified.js && ncp dist-node-declartions dist-node-minified && rimraf dist-node-declartions && ts-node tools/webpack-node/distReplace.ts -i ./dist-node-minified
scripts.build-node-unminified: webpack --config ./tools/webpack-node/webpack.prod.unminified.js && ncp dist-node-declartions dist-node-unminified && rimraf dist-node-declartions && ts-node tools/webpack-node/distReplace.ts -i ./dist-node-unminified
scripts.doc: typedoc --hideGenerator --readme README.md --target ES6 --module commonjs --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --mode file --out dist/docs/ src

author: vtxf
owner: 北京西部世界科技有限公司
